content.text:
# Draft:Frostware Executor

----
Frostware Executor, also called Frostware, is a tool that lets you run scripts in the online game Roblox. It lets people change the game by running special Lua scripts inside Roblox. You can get Frostware from its official website [https://getfrosts. xyz getfrosts. xyz].
History
Frostware first came out in the middle of 2024. It was made to be easy to use and light on your computer. After stopping for some time, the makers released version 2.0 that works on Android phones and can bypass Roblox’s new anti-cheat system called Hyperion. Since then, Frostware has been updated often to keep working with Roblox.
Features
* Runs Lua scripts live inside Roblox games
* Can bypass Roblox’s anti-cheat protection
* Works on Android; can work on Windows with extra software
* Has a library of scripts made by the community
* Has a simple user interface to edit and run scripts
* Gets updates fast when Roblox changes
How It Works
Frostware is made with Lua and C++. On Windows, it works by injecting code into Roblox. On Android, it is a changed APK file. It changes some Roblox functions to stop script checks. The tool is updated a lot to keep beating Roblox’s anti-cheat system.
Official Website
The real Frostware can only be downloaded from [https://getfrosts. xyz getfrosts. xyz]. Other sites may be fake and dangerous.
There is also an official Discord server for help and news: [https://discord.gg/getfrost discord.gg/getfrost].
Team
Frostware is made by a group of people with different roles:
Leaders
* Jakey – Owner and founder
* Kakey – Co-owner
* Mini – Co-owner
Managers
* Ari – Lead director
* Scarlet – Chief operating officer
* spiderman – Assistant COO
* Brock Zazu – Lead A.S.T
* Kaiso – Secondary A.S.T
Developers
* Texas – Android library and API maker
* OnecreatorX – UI developer
* actualmrp, Xenn, Ackton, Fsploit, Zleak – Script developers
* Khang, Kayzi – UI and shared library makers
* Rupo – Game cheat developer
* YellowGreg, Wspboy12 – Web developers
Community
Frostware is talked about in places like GitHub, Discord, and Reddit where people share Roblox exploits. It is known for working fast and easy but exact user numbers are not public.
Legal and Ethics
Using Frostware breaks Roblox’s rules. It also might be illegal in some places because it changes the game software. The makers say it is only for learning and testing.
Notability
There are not many independent news or articles about Frostware. Most info comes from official pages or fan communities. This might make it hard for the article to meet Wikipedia’s rules.
References
